content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Their spicy Galbi stew is awesome. I could not help stop eating it even I was really full. Their spicy marinated raw crab is very tasty but its too spicy I could not handle more than 2 pieces. We wanted to try all different kind of Jeons, we asked to a server if we order mixed combination things it comes with little bit of all different Jeons include seafood green onion pancake. He told us yes. But it did not come with that item. :(I still can give 5 stars cuz their spicy galbi stew is the best I ever had. Better than S_N_Dan place.I will come back here for that stew!! Thank you! It was great!
